code: var BASE_URL='https://restcountries.com/v2/';export var ALL_COUNTRIES=BASE_URL+'all?fields=name,capital,flags,population,region';export var searchByCountry=function searchByCountry(name){return BASE_URL+'name/'+name;};export var filterByCode=function filterByCode(code){return BASE_URL+'alpha?codes='+code.join(',');};
